body.p: Some elements of an existing project can be changed.

ol.li: Click the target project and then click Edit. The target Repository cannot be changed. If the Repository is wrong, delete this project and create a new one.
Select the target build and click Edit.
Scroll down and click Add Targets.
Specify the environments this build should be deployed to.
Find the desired Project in the list and then click View Details.
Scroll down to Notification Targets and then click New Target.
Click the trash-can icon to the right of the target project in the list.

body.section:
Iniviting Users to a Project Only individuals assigned to a project as a User can work on that project.
Click the Projects tab.
Note the URL listed after Invite.
Copy and send this URL to the person you want to add as a User.
